item.title: 特朗普对英国的重要访问正值斯塔默最糟糕的时刻
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）首相在去年 7 月当选时承诺，在保守党多年的混乱和丑闻之后，要建立一个 "更安静 "的政治。在不到一周的时间里，英国政府就有两名高级官员因丑闻丧生，这让首相面临着一项他从未想象过的指控：他的工党政府并不比保守党逊色。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer was elected last July promising a “quieter” politics after years of chaos and scandal under the Conservatives. Losing two senior members of the UK government to scandal in less than a week sees the premier facing a charge he could never have imagined: that his Labour administration is no less noisy than the Tories.】
